frameDefinitions: In this frame, a Communicator judges the Addressee and then communicates that appraisal directly to the Addressee.
The words in this frame have to do with people and the personal Relationships they are or can be a part of.
A Searcher looks all over a Ground in order to find a Sought_entity.
In this frame, an Agent engages in personal body care by grooming either a Patient or a Body_part.
A Cognizer_agent attempts to find some Sought_entity by examining some Ground.
An Agent manipulates a Sound_maker or a Cause causes the Sound_maker to emit a sound.
frameExamples: The principal <t>rebuked</t> the student for cheating on the exam.
And of course that drippy <t><fex name='Partner_1'>boyfriend</fex></t> of hers backed her up.
The newcomers <t>combed</t> the area looking for minerals
The monks would <t>ring</t> the bell until sundown.
listRoleDefinitions: The <fen>Communicator</fen> communicates a judgment to the <fen>Addressee</fen>.
The <fen>Addressee</fen> is jduged by the <fen>Communicator</fen> and receives the message of approval or disapproval.
The <fen>Topic</fen> is the subject on which the <fen>Addressee</fen> is being judged.
The <fen>Reason</fen> is why the Communicator forms the type of judgment they form.
The <fen>Medium</fen> identifies the physical or abstract entity in which the judgment is conveyed.
An action or entity under the control of the <fen>Communicator</fen> that expresses the criticism or praise directed towards the <fen>Addressee</fen>.
The point in time at which the <fen>Communicator</fen> berates or compliments the <fen>Addressee</fen>.
The location where the <fen>Communicator</fen> admonishes the <fen>Addressee</fen>.
That partner in the <fen>Relationship</fen> who is realized as the subject of verbs in active form sentences, or of adjectives in predicative uses.
That partner in the <fen>Relationship</fen> who is not expressed as the external argument.
The joint construal of both <fen>Partners</fen> in the <fen>Relationship</fen>.
The person who is looking all over the <fen>Ground</fen> for the <fen>Sought_entity</fen>.
The location that the <fen>Searcher</fen> covers in looking for the <fen>Sought_entity</fen>.
The entity that the <fen>Searcher</fen> wants to find.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Searcher</fen> scoures the <fen>Ground</fen>.
The agent is the person who does the grooming.
The patient is the person who gets washed.
This is the region of the body that gets groomed.
This role identifies the time when the event occurs.
Where the event takes place.
The person who attempts to find the Sought_entity.
This is the entity that the <fen>Ground</fen> may contain. Typically, it is expressed as a <ment>for</ment>-PP.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the Seeking occurs.
A spatial setting larger than the <fen>Ground</fen> in which the Seeking event occurs.
The individual that manipulates a Sound_maker so that it makes Noise.
The entity that produces the Noise, as a result of the action of the Agent.
The inanimate force of nature that causes the <fen>Sound_maker</fen> to produce noise.
The time at which the noise is produced.
The location at which the sound is produced.
listRoleExamples: The teacher scolded the children <fex>about their meessy cookie eating</fex>.
The principal rebuked the student <fex>for cheating on the exam</fex>.
Though she had killed him so long ago, she could still see his jeering <fex>smile</fex>.
She complimented me <fex>almost every morning</fex> on my smart starched shirts.
We were scolded <fex>in the kitchen</fex> by the biggest cook you've ever seen.
<fex>They</fex> first gained entry into the house of Raja Rao, who resides on the ground floor and ransacked the house for valuables.
I had never really seen much on the bigfoot subject or I would have scoured <fex>the area</fex> for signs and looked for droppings
Coast Guard and Navy ships and aircraft combed the area <fex>for the six aircraft</fex>
The police were hunting for evidence in my house <fex>yesterday</fex>
<fex>In Paris</fex> police were hunting for suspects in two of the city's southerns suburbs today
<fex>You</fex> can ring the bell as often as you'd like.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: Salaula: the World of Secondhand Clothing
the Anoya Zulu boys' secondary school
